statements: SELECT * FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE building_id = 1 ORDER BY usage_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT water_meter_id, SUM(daily_usage) AS total_usage FROM Water_Usage_Data GROUP BY water_meter_id
SELECT id, usage_date FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE daily_usage > 100 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT building_id, AVG(daily_usage) AS avg_usage FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' GROUP BY building_id ORDER BY avg_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE daily_usage <= 50
SELECT id, daily_usage, usage_date FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE building_id = 5 ORDER BY usage_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE daily_usage > 100 AND water_meter_id = 3 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT building_id, SUM(daily_usage) AS total_usage FROM Water_Usage_Data GROUP BY building_id HAVING total_usage > 500 ORDER BY total_usage DESC
SELECT DISTINCT building_id FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY building_id
SELECT AVG(daily_usage) AS average_usage, MAX(daily_usage) AS max_usage, MIN(daily_usage) AS min_usage FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE water_meter_id = 2
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage_Data;
SELECT building_name, water_usage, date_recorded FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE water_usage > 100;
SELECT id, building_name, water_meter_id FROM Water_Usage_Data ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT initiative_name, description, start_date, end_date FROM Green_Building_Initiatives;
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT building_name, SUM(water_usage) AS total_water_usage FROM Water_Usage_Data GROUP BY building_name HAVING total_water_usage > 500 ORDER BY total_water_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE building_name LIKE 'B%' AND date_recorded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT building_name, AVG(water_usage) AS avg_water_usage FROM Water_Usage_Data GROUP BY building_name ORDER BY avg_water_usage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT W.building_name, G.initiative_name FROM Water_Usage_Data W JOIN Green_Building_Initiatives G ON W.building_name = G.initiative_name;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_data;
SELECT building_name, water_consumption FROM water_usage_data WHERE water_consumption > 100;
SELECT building_name, water_consumption, timestamp FROM water_usage_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_info WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT building_name, water_consumption, timestamp FROM water_usage_data WHERE building_name LIKE '%Medical%' ORDER BY water_consumption DESC;
SELECT building_name, water_consumption FROM water_usage_data
SELECT * FROM water_usage_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT building_name, water_consumption, timestamp FROM water_usage_data WHERE water_consumption > 100
SELECT SUM(water_consumption) AS total_water_consumption FROM water_usage_data
SELECT building_info.building_name, sustainability_report.water_usage FROM building_info JOIN sustainability_report ON building_info.building_id = sustainability_report.building_id
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, building_id, consumption, date FROM WaterUsageData WHERE consumption > 100;
SELECT name, address FROM Building WHERE build_year > 2000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityReporting WHERE carbon_footprint > 50 AND water_footprint < 10;
SELECT id, building_id, certification FROM GreenBuildingInitiatives ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM Building ORDER BY name DESC, build_year ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT building_id, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM WaterUsageData WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY building_id HAVING total_consumption > 5000 ORDER BY total_consumption DESC;
SELECT b.name AS building_name, s.report_year, s.carbon_footprint FROM Building b JOIN SustainabilityReporting s ON b.id = s.building_id WHERE s.carbon_footprint > 50;
SELECT gi.* FROM GreenBuildingInitiatives gi JOIN Building b ON gi.building_id = b.id WHERE b.address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT b.name AS building_name, gi.certification AS building_certification FROM Building b LEFT JOIN GreenBuildingInitiatives gi ON b.id = gi.building_id WHERE gi.certification IS NULL;
SELECT id, building_id, water_consumption, date_recorded FROM WaterUsageData;
SELECT building_id, water_consumption, date_recorded, id FROM WaterUsageData;
SELECT id, water_consumption, date_recorded, building_id FROM WaterUsageData;
SELECT building_id, date_recorded, id, water_consumption FROM WaterUsageData;
SELECT date_recorded, building_id, id, water_consumption FROM WaterUsageData;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE building_id = 1 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT building_id, SUM(water_consumption) AS total_consumption FROM WaterUsageData GROUP BY building_id HAVING total_consumption > 100
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE water_consumption BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY date_recorded ASC
SELECT AVG(water_consumption) AS average_consumption, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date_recorded) AS month FROM WaterUsageData GROUP BY month ORDER BY month
SELECT building_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM WaterUsageData GROUP BY building_id ORDER BY total_records DESC
